description: PRAGATI: PM Modi reviews progress towards handling and resolution of grievances related to income tax administration PRAGATI: PM Modi reviews progress towards implementation of the Pradhan Mantri Kha
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Today’s PRAGATI session, the 15th such interaction, witnessed crucial discussions on infra projects across India. Reviewed handling & resolution mechanisms of grievances relating to tax administration & called for more usage of technology in doing so.

Discussed progress of Pradhan Mantri Khanij Kshetra Kalyan Yojana & how the scheme can further benefit tribal communities & the poor. http://nm-4.com/ao9w
